cdf3e56bacd3895262af8a1df9ca5c81f4071970.commitMessage: Utils class has been splitted to CommonUtils and TokenUtils. Issue #1898

3a20dbe8edafe0cca300b7b9dfa48effa9a36a06.commitMessage: Use use Java 7 instead of custom logic for relative paths, issue #857

e00c478dd61d9d883e41b500b780ab217582c2e7.commitMessage: clean up the code that was assigning to a parameter.

06b377b34cb81a6ba3fe48880c31a9a093b2a473.commitMessage: bug 1080343: fix handling of suppressions to only effect file errors.

21f0b07bd031f022d14106150af66ceddb4c06b8.commitMessage:
Refactor and extend filters to filter chains.
Add suppression filters.

54a09706ec1db32435b09e6b6910813325558f8d.commitMessage:
Introduced MessageDispatcher interface so
FileSetChecks do not need to be tightly coupled
with Checker to report errors.

FileSetCheck implementations report errors now.

Error counting in Checker is now done via an
AuditListener, no need to bother about that in
each individual FileSetCheck.

82b2ba526976588d550cac698e512f8de6c1ffc6.commitMessage:
Moved stripping of basedir to the event handling routines.
This separates concerns in parse(File) as a preparation for moving that method to TreeWalker.
It also fixes bug #622290 (package name reported incorrectly) once I integrate PackageHtmlCheck.
